UPDATE tl_ms_ve SET ab_naor = :veName, ab_emss = :companyEmail, ab_ofss = :officeAddress, ab_ron = :province, ab_cty = :city, ab_pode = :pos, ab_cry = :country, ab_tne = :telephone, ab_mone = :mobilePhone, ab_emdir = :directorEmail, ab_dirme = :nameDirector, ab_wess = :webCompany, ab_bfs = :businessFieldSector, ab_lsi = :radioLocation, ab_caturl = :catUpload, ab_prd = :password, ab_catname = :catName, ab_ume = :companyEmail, ab_rfus = 2, ab_license = 1 WHERE ab_coorsa = :vendorCode

SELECT idVendor, vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, picName, mobilePhone, postalCode, province, region, country, nib, doi, rtRw, telephone, webAddress, companyDomicilie, npwpName, npwpNumber, npwpType, effectiveSince, idNpwp, fileNameNpwp, fileNpwp, statusSppkp, sppkpNumber, serviceOffice, serviceOfficeAddress, fileSppkp, catalogueUrl, catalogueName FROM v_ivendor WHERE email = :email and (:password IS NULL OR password = :password)

select count(*) from (SELECT idVendor, vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, picName, mobilePhone, postalCode, province, region, country, nib, doi, rtRw, telephone, webAddress, companyDomicilie, npwpName, npwpNumber, npwpType, effectiveSince, idNpwp, fileNameNpwp, fileNpwp, statusSppkp, sppkpNumber, serviceOffice, serviceOfficeAddress, fileSppkp, catalogueUrl, catalogueName FROM v_ivendor WHERE email = :email and (:password IS NULL OR password = :password)) wmTempTable

UPDATE tl_ms_ta_konf SET ab_idax = :taxId, ab_type = :typeNpwp, ab_name = :nameNpwp, ab_add = :addressNpwp, ab_effect = :effectiveNpwp, ab_conf_num = :taxConfirmationNumber, ab_serv_of = :taxServiceOffice, ab_add_serv = :addressTaxService, ab_cert_num = :taxCertificateNumber, ab_cerpe = :typeCertificateNpwp, ab_vafrom = :validCertificateFrom, ab_vato = :validCertificateTo, ab_file_npwp = :npwpUpload, ab_filename_npwp = :nameNpwpUpload, ab_file_sppkp = :sppkpUpload, ab_filename_sppkp = :nameSppkpUpload, ab_file_certi = :taxCertiUpload, ab_filename_certi = :nameCertiUpload WHERE ab_id = :id

SELECT tl_ms_acnk.ab_idng, tl_ms_acnk.ab_coorsa, tl_ms_ba.ab_bame, tl_ms_acnk.ab_coey, tl_ms_acnk.ab_acer, tl_ms_acnk.ab_acme, tl_ms_acnk.ab_bch, tl_ms_acnk.ab_ccy, tl_ms_acnk.ab_bepe, tl_ms_acnk.ab_beus, tl_ms_acnk.ab_supdoc, tl_ms_acnk.ab_supdocme FROM tl_ms_acnk JOIN tl_ms_ba ON tl_ms_acnk.ab_baey = tl_ms_ba.ab_baey WHERE tl_ms_acnk.ab_coorsa = :sVeCode AND tl_ms_ba.ab_coey = tl_ms_acnk.ab_coey

select count(*) from (SELECT tl_ms_acnk.ab_idng, tl_ms_acnk.ab_coorsa, tl_ms_ba.ab_bame, tl_ms_acnk.ab_coey, tl_ms_acnk.ab_acer, tl_ms_acnk.ab_acme, tl_ms_acnk.ab_bch, tl_ms_acnk.ab_ccy, tl_ms_acnk.ab_bepe, tl_ms_acnk.ab_beus, tl_ms_acnk.ab_supdoc, tl_ms_acnk.ab_supdocme FROM tl_ms_acnk JOIN tl_ms_ba ON tl_ms_acnk.ab_baey = tl_ms_ba.ab_baey WHERE tl_ms_acnk.ab_coorsa = :sVeCode AND tl_ms_ba.ab_coey = tl_ms_acnk.ab_coey) wmTempTable
DELETE FROM tl_ms_ta_konf WHERE ab_id = :id

INSERT INTO tl_ms_acnk (ab_coey, ab_baey, ab_ume, ab_acer, ab_acme, ab_bch, ab_ccy, ab_bepe, ab_beus) Values (:countryCode, :bankName, :userName, :accountNumber, :accountName, :branch, :currency, :beneficiaryType, :beneficiaryStatus)

select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM v_dataTaxOverseas WHERE UserName = :userName) wmTempTable
UPDATE tl_ms_em SET ab_name = :namePic, ab_emss = :emailPic, ab_mobile_phone = :phonePic, ab_position = :positionPic, ab_puon = :areaPic, ab_ron = :reason, ab_rfus = 50 WHERE ab_idil = :idPIC
UPDATE tl_ms_ve SET ab_rfus = 202 WHERE ab_coorsa = :vendorCode

SELECT vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, mobilePhone, postalCode, region, rtRw, telephone, title, webAddress, catalogueUrl FROM v_ivendor WHERE GroupVendor IN ('ZNTO','ZNAO','ZTAO','ZTPO')
select * from tl_ms_re where ab_coey = :country
select count(*) from (select * from tl_ms_re where ab_coey = :country) wmTempTable

UPDATE tl_ms_ta_konf SET ab_idax = :taxNumber, ab_coorsa = :sVeCodeOverseas, ab_effect = :taxEffective, ab_file_npwp = :taxFileUpload, ab_filename_npwp = :taxFileName, ab_file_certidom = :certiDomUpload, ab_filename_certidom = :certiDomFileName, ab_vafrom = :validFrom, ab_vato = :validTo WHERE ab_id = :id
select * from v_vendor where (:VCode IS NULL OR VendorCode LIKE CONCAT('%', :VCode, '%')) OR (:VName IS NULL OR VendorName LIKE CONCAT('%', :VName, '%'))
select count(*) from (select * from v_vendor where (:VCode IS NULL OR VendorCode LIKE CONCAT('%', :VCode, '%')) OR (:VName IS NULL OR VendorName LIKE CONCAT('%', :VName, '%'))) wmTempTable

UPDATE tl_ms_em SET ab_ume = :userName WHERE ab_coorsa = :vendorCode
select * from tl_tr_door where ab_nant = '17' AND ab_coorsa = :vendorCode
select count(*) from (select * from tl_tr_door where ab_nant = '17' AND ab_coorsa = :vendorCode) wmTempTable
INSERT INTO tl_ms_em (ab_name, ab_emss, ab_mobile_phone, ab_position, ab_puon, ab_password, ab_ume) VALUES (:namePIC, :emailPIC, :phonePIC, :selectPositionPIC, :selectAreaPIC, :password, :userName)

INSERT INTO tl_ms_acnk_temp (ab_coorsa, ab_coey, ab_baey, ab_ume, ab_acer, ab_acme, ab_bch, ab_ccy, ab_bepe, ab_beus, ab_flag) Values (:vendorCode, :countryCode, :bankKey, :userName, :accountNumber, :accountName, :branch, :currency, :beneficiaryType, :beneficiaryStatus, 0)

SELECT idVendor, vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, picName, mobilePhone, postalCode, province, region, country, nib, doi, rtRw, telephone, webAddress, npwpName, npwpNumber, npwpType, effectiveSince, idNpwp, fileNameNpwp, fileNpwp, statusSppkp, sppkpNumber, serviceOffice, serviceOfficeAddress, fileSppkp, catalogueUrl, catalogueName
FROM v_ivendor WHERE (:npwpNumber IS NULL OR npwpNumber = :npwpNumber) AND (:idDirector IS NULL OR idDirector = :idDirector)

select count(*) from (SELECT idVendor, vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, picName, mobilePhone, postalCode, province, region, country, nib, doi, rtRw, telephone, webAddress, npwpName, npwpNumber, npwpType, effectiveSince, idNpwp, fileNameNpwp, fileNpwp, statusSppkp, sppkpNumber, serviceOffice, serviceOfficeAddress, fileSppkp, catalogueUrl, catalogueName
FROM v_ivendor WHERE (:npwpNumber IS NULL OR npwpNumber = :npwpNumber) AND (:idDirector IS NULL OR idDirector = :idDirector)) wmTempTable
INSERT INTO tl_tr_door (ab_idor, ab_nant, ab_nale, ab_stnt, ab_pathfile) VALUES (:idVendor, '17', :fileName, 'Aktif', :fileUrl)

UPDATE v_ivendor SET Title = :selectTitle, VendorName = :veName, Address = :officeAddress, RtRw = :rtRw, Kelurahan = :kelurahan, Kecamatan=:kecamatan, PostalCode = :pos, City = :city, PicUrl = :picUpload, Telephone = :telephone, MobilePhone = :mobilePhone, WebAddress = :webCompany, EmailDirector = :directorEmail, DirectorName = :directorName, IdDirector = :idDirector, Email = :companyEmail, Location = :location, BusinessFieldSector = :businessFieldSector, CatalogueUrl = :catUpload, Domicilie = 'Local' Where VendorCode = :sVeCodeLocal
SELECT * FROM v_PIC WHERE ab_ume = :userName
select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM v_PIC WHERE ab_ume = :userName) wmTempTable
UPDATE tl_tr_door SET ab_nale = :fileName, ab_pathFile = :filePath WHERE ab_idnt = :idDocBank
UPDATE tl_ms_ve SET ab_ume = :userName, ab_emss = :email, ab_prd = :password WHERE ab_coorsa = :vendorCode

UPDATE tl_ms_ve SET ab_tle = :tittle, ab_naor = :veName, ab_emss = :companyEmail, ab_ofss = :officeAddress, ab_cty = :city, ab_nib = :nib, ab_doi = :doi, ab_tne = :telephone, ab_mone = :mobilePhone, ab_rt = :rtRw, ab_klrhn = :kelurahan, ab_kcmtn = :kecamatan, ab_pode = :pos, ab_ron = :province, ab_emdir = :directorEmail, ab_dirme = :nameDirector, ab_notp = :idDirector, ab_wess = :webCompany, ab_bfs = :businessFieldSector, ab_lsi = :radioLocation, ab_picurl = :picUpload, ab_caturl = :catUpload, ab_prd = :password, ab_picname = :picName, ab_catname = :catName, ab_ume = :companyEmail, ab_rfus = 2, ab_license = 1
WHERE ab_coorsa = :vendorCode AND ab_ume = :username
UPDATE tl_ms_ve SET ab_prd = :password WHERE ab_emss = :username and ab_emss = :email
INSERT INTO tl_hr (ab_inby, ab_cute, ab_aon) VALUES (:inputBy, GETDATE(), :History)
UPDATE tl_tr_door SET ab_nale = :fileName, ab_pathFile = :filePath, ab_don = :remark WHERE ab_idnt = :idSupDoc
SELECT * FROM tl_ms_notif_email where ab_location = :puon
select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM tl_ms_notif_email where ab_location = :puon) wmTempTable

SELECT DISTINCT a.ab_coorsa as vendor_code, RTRIM(a.ab_tle) + ' ' + RTRIM(a.ab_naor) as vendor_name, a.ab_ofss as address, a.ab_tne as telephone, a.ab_emss as email, b.ab_name as name FROM tl_ms_ve a JOIN tl_ms_em b ON a.ab_coorsa = b.ab_coorsa WHERE a.ab_coorsa = :vendorcode

select count(*) from (SELECT DISTINCT a.ab_coorsa as vendor_code, RTRIM(a.ab_tle) + ' ' + RTRIM(a.ab_naor) as vendor_name, a.ab_ofss as address, a.ab_tne as telephone, a.ab_emss as email, b.ab_name as name FROM tl_ms_ve a JOIN tl_ms_em b ON a.ab_coorsa = b.ab_coorsa WHERE a.ab_coorsa = :vendorcode) wmTempTable
SELECT * FROM tl_ms_cu
select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM tl_ms_cu) wmTempTable
INSERT INTO tl_tr_door (ab_idor, ab_nant, ab_nale, ab_stnt, ab_pathfile) VALUES (:idVendor, '12', :fileName, 'Aktif', :fileUrl)
UPDATE v_vendor SET VendorName = :veName, Title = :selectTitle, City = :city, Email = :directorEmail, Telephone = :telephone, MobilePhone = :mobilePhone WHERE VendorCode = :sVeCodeLocal
Select * FROM tl_ms_ba WHERE ab_coey = :countryCode AND ab_baey = :bankCode
select count(*) from (Select * FROM tl_ms_ba WHERE ab_coey = :countryCode AND ab_baey = :bankCode) wmTempTable

UPDATE tl_ms_acnk SET ab_coey = :sCountryCode, ab_baey = :bankName, ab_acer = :accountNumber, ab_acme = :accountName, ab_bch = :branch, ab_ccy = :currency, ab_bepe = :beneficiaryType, ab_beus = :beneficiaryStatus WHERE ab_idng = :id
SELECT * FROM tl_ms_co
select count(*) from (SELECT * FROM tl_ms_co) wmTempTable
UPDATE tl_ms_acnk SET ab_ume = :userName WHERE ab_coorsa = :vendorCode
UPDATE tl_tr_door SET ab_nale = :fileName, ab_pathFile = :filePath WHERE ab_idnt = :idCertiDom
Select * From v_supDoc where ab_idor = :idVendor
select count(*) from (Select * From v_supDoc where ab_idor = :idVendor) wmTempTable

SELECT idVendor, vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, picName, mobilePhone, postalCode, province, region, country, nib, doi, rtRw, telephone, webAddress, companyDomicilie, puon, license, npwpName, npwpNumber, npwpType, effectiveSince, idNpwp, fileNameNpwp, fileNpwp, statusSppkp, sppkpNumber, serviceOffice, serviceOfficeAddress, fileSppkp, catalogueUrl, catalogueName FROM v_ivendor WHERE email = :email

select count(*) from (SELECT idVendor, vendorCode, Username, Password, Title, vendorName, add1, add2, add3, address, businessFieldSector, city, directorName, email, emailDirector, groupVendor, idDirector, kecamatan, kelurahan, location, picUrl, picName, mobilePhone, postalCode, province, region, country, nib, doi, rtRw, telephone, webAddress, companyDomicilie, puon, license, npwpName, npwpNumber, npwpType, effectiveSince, idNpwp, fileNameNpwp, fileNpwp, statusSppkp, sppkpNumber, serviceOffice, serviceOfficeAddress, fileSppkp, catalogueUrl, catalogueName FROM v_ivendor WHERE email = :email) wmTempTable
DELETE FROM tl_ms_acnk_konf WHERE ab_id_acnk_konf = :id
Select * From v_dataTaxLocal where UserName = :userName
select count(*) from (Select * From v_dataTaxLocal where UserName = :userName) wmTempTable
SELECT CONCAT(ADD1, ADD2, ADD3) as address, * FROM v_vendor where VendorCode LIKE CONCAT('%', :vendor_code, '%')
select count(*) from (SELECT CONCAT(ADD1, ADD2, ADD3) as address, * FROM v_vendor where VendorCode LIKE CONCAT('%', :vendor_code, '%')) wmTempTable
select * from tl_ms_re where ab_coey = 'ID'
